name: Blobs
description:
Gameplay

You control a queen-blob and have to turn other blobs into your followers to protect your queen.

You have to survive as long as possible. You earn points which you can spend to upgrade the stats of your queen to make it even further!

Controls
  • Hold left mouse button to move queen
  • Hold right mouse button to move followers
Developer note

Blobs is a fun little game i made for a challenge called the "1 Dollar Challenge", where i have 2 weeks time to make 1 Dollar with a game.
I had really fun making this little game and encountered a lot of new problems i had to solve and learned a lot in the process of making this game, including my first ever pixel art.

If you like my game you can leave me a dollar. This would make my challenge complete and i would be really really grateful.

Of course it would be also nice if you would leave me some feedback so i can improve on my future games.
